chinese: n安慰；解脱；减轻；浮雕
english: relief

chinese: 令这位病人感到安慰的是，医生告诉他一切正常。
english: To the relief of the patient, the doctor told him everything is fine

chinese: adj 天生的
english: inborn

chinese: 这个孩子有数学天赋。
english: The child has an inborn talent for mathematics

chinese: n经济学家
english: economist

chinese: 这位著名的经济学家常被称作"经济学之父”。
english: This famous economist is often referred to as the Father of Economics

chinese: adj 不利的；（方向上）逆的；在相反的方向上移动（或运转）；相反的
english: adverse

chinese: 蛀牙是过度饮用碳酸饮料的坏处之一。
english: Bad teeth are one of the adverse effects of drinking too many carbonated beverages

chinese: n 风度，仪态；出席，到场
english: presence

chinese: 她强大的气场吸引了所有人的注意。
english: She attracts everyone's attention with her strong presence

chinese: n 天平，磅秤；刻度，尺度，标度；鳞片，鳞状物；规模
english: scale

chinese: 站在体重秤上来测自己的体重吧。
english: Stand on the weighing scales to get your weight

chinese: n 建筑师；设计师
english: architect

chinese: 这位建筑师正在看他设计的建筑模型。
english: The architect is looking at a model of the building he designed

chinese: （汽车等）点火开关；点火，着火
english: ignition

chinese: 扭转钥匙来启动点火开关。
english: Turn the key to start the ignition

chinese: n 起源；由来，来源；出身
english: origin

chinese: 虽然人类的起源仍然是谜，但是我们认为我们的祖先生活在树上。
english: The origin of humankind is still mysterious, but we think our ancestors lived in the trees

chinese: adj 互相的；共同的
english: mutual

chinese: 良好的沟通能架起一座相互理解的桥梁。
english: Good communication can build a bridge of mutual understanding

chinese: vi 照亮 vt 阐释；说明
english: illuminate

chinese: 黑暗中，火把照亮了他的脸。
english: The torch illuminated his face in the dark

chinese: n 结果，后果；重要性
english: consequence

chinese: 吃太多垃圾食品的后果就是长胖。
english: The consequence of eating too much junk food is getting fat

chinese: n 性格
english: personality

chinese: 尽管他们是双胞胎，但他们的性格大不相同。
english: Although they're twins, they're very different in personality

chinese: n 人道主义者，人类学者，人文学者adj 人文主义的，人道主义的
english: humanist

chinese: 孔子是世界上最出名的人文主义哲学家之一。
english: Confucius is one of the world's most famous humanist philosophers

chinese: adj 饮食的，与饮食有关的
english: dietary

chinese: 饮食改变有助于减肥。
english: Dietary changes can accelerate weight loss

chinese: n 排练，排演；叙述，详述
english: rehearsal

chinese: 这四个女孩正在排练。
english: The four girls are having a rehearsal now
